DOC.brief_summary: The aim present randomize control trial evaluate health effect physical activity transport leisure time domain everyday life develop durable physical activity regimen , i.e . go lifestyle intervention daily lifestyle routine , overweight individual . Subjects randomize 1 4 group . 1 : Vigorous intensity leisure time physical activity , 2 : Moderate intensity leisure time activity , 3 : Active commuting bicycle , 4 : non-intervention control group
DOC.brief_title: Active Commuting To Improve Well-being Health Everyday Life
DOC.criteria: Healthy No engagement habitual structured physical activity Body mass index 2535 kg/m2 Body fat percentage > 32 % woman > 25 % men Maximum oxygen uptake ( VO2max ) < 40 ml O2/kg/min woman < 45 ml O2/kg/min men Ethnicity : Caucasian Chronic use medicine Smoking Fasting plasma glucose > 6,1 mmol/L Blood pressure > 140/90 mm Hg Abnormal rest work ECG Parents sibling diagnose type 2 diabetes For woman : Follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) concentration > 35 milliunits/ml , pregnancy planning pregnancy within coming year
